name: @guld/iso-test
description: Isomorphic test framework for guld libs and apps

scripts.test:
timeout 1 node -r esm ./pass.js && echo; timeout 1 node ./server.js ./pass.js && f=$(timeout 1 node -r esm ./fail.js 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then printf '(node) ./fail.js
pass	fail.js failed as expected

'; else printf 'fail	failed to fail fail.js
'; exit 1; fi && f=$(timeout 1 node ./server.js ./fail.js 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then printf '(browser) ./fail.js
pass	fail.js failed as expected

'; else printf 'fail	failed to fail fail.js
'; exit 1; fi && f=$(timeout 1 node -r esm ./error.js 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then printf '(node) ./error.js
pass	error.js failed as expected

'; else printf 'fail	failed to fail error.js
'; exit 1; fi && f=$(timeout 1 node ./server.js ./error.js 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then printf '(browser) ./error.js
pass	error.js failed as expected

'; else printf 'fail	failed to fail error.js
'; exit 1; fi; echo 'All tests passed!'

author: isysd
